law.catch_line: Systematized plan of filing, bookkeeping and accounting.
law.text: The Governor shall cause each agency to keep a carefully systematized and well devised plan of filing, bookkeeping and accounting as prescribed by the Finance and Administration Cabinet.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art, I, sec. 10. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4618-167.
